summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 24, 2019. It includes official out-count forms, inmate rosters, and count slips, which are routine prison headcount and assignment records. The most significant entry is an inmate roster showing Jeffrey Epstein and another inmate, Tartaglione, were scheduled for an attorney visit on that date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate '76318-054' on an inmate roster for an attorney visit assignment on July 24, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Listed as inmate '78514-054' on the same inmate roster as Jeffrey Epstein for an attorney visit assignment on July 24, 2019.

connections.description: Both were inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center and were listed on the same attorney visit roster on July 24, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative headcounts and inmate work/assignment assignments were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Epstein's Attorney Visit Roster Entry
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was listed on an inmate roster with an assignment category of 'ATTY', indicating he was scheduled for or involved in an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York as of July 24, 2019.
An inmate roster shows Epstein (Register No. 76318-054) was assigned for an attorney visit ('ATTY') on July 24, 2019.
Another inmate, Tartaglione (Register No. 78514-054), was listed on the same attorney visit roster.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for inmate counts and assignments, providing a snapshot of prison routine.
The date of these records is July 24, 2019, which is less than two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
